registry.comment:
Copyright (c) 2017-2021, The Khronos Group Inc.
SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 OR MIT
------------------------------------------------------------------------
This file, xr.xml, is the OpenXR API Registry. It is a critically important and normative part of the OpenXR Specification, including a canonical machine-readable definition of the API, parameter and member validation language incorporated into the Specification and reference pages, and other material which is registered by Khronos, such as tags used by extension and layer authors. The only authoritative version of xr.xml is the one maintained in the default branch of the Khronos OpenXR GitHub project.

vendorid.name: KHR
vendorid.comment: This is the next available Khronos vendor ID

tag.name: MSFT
tag.author: Microsoft
tag.contact: Alex Turner @alexturn, Yin Li @yl_msft, Bryce Hutchings @brycehutchings, Lachlan Ford @laford_msft, Minmin Gong @gongminmin

types.type: // OpenXR current version number. #define XR_CURRENT_API_VERSION XR_MAKE_VERSION(1, 0, 20)
#if !defined(XR_DEFINE_HANDLE) #if (XR_PTR_SIZE == 8) #define XR_DEFINE_HANDLE(object) typedef struct object##_T* object; #else #define XR_DEFINE_HANDLE(object) typedef uint64_t object; #endif #endif
types.comment: XrBaseInStructure and XrBaseOutStructure use "struct" in their member definitions because they are recursive structures and this is easier than modifying the tooling to output forward declarations.

enums.name: API Constants
enums.comment: Misc. hardcoded constants - not an enumerated type

enum.name: XR_SUCCESS
enum.comment: Function successfully completed.

enum.name: XR_TIMEOUT_EXPIRED
enum.comment: The specified timeout time occurred before the operation could complete.

enum.name: XR_SESSION_LOSS_PENDING
enum.comment: The session will be lost soon.

enum.name: XR_EVENT_UNAVAILABLE
enum.comment: No event was available.

enum.name: XR_SPACE_BOUNDS_UNAVAILABLE
enum.comment: The space's bounds are not known at the moment.

enum.name: XR_SESSION_NOT_FOCUSED
enum.comment: The session is not in the focused state.

enum.name: XR_FRAME_DISCARDED
enum.comment: A frame has been discarded from composition.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_VALIDATION_FAILURE
enum.comment: The function usage was invalid in some way.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_RUNTIME_FAILURE
enum.comment: The runtime failed to handle the function in an unexpected way that is not covered by another error result.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY
enum.comment: A memory allocation has failed.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_API_VERSION_UNSUPPORTED
enum.comment: The runtime does not support the requested API version.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_INITIALIZATION_FAILED
enum.comment: Initialization of object could not be completed.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_FUNCTION_UNSUPPORTED
enum.comment: The requested function was not found or is otherwise unsupported.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_FEATURE_UNSUPPORTED
enum.comment: The requested feature is not supported.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_EXTENSION_NOT_PRESENT
enum.comment: A requested extension is not supported.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_LIMIT_REACHED
enum.comment: The runtime supports no more of the requested resource.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SIZE_INSUFFICIENT
enum.comment: The supplied size was smaller than required.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_HANDLE_INVALID
enum.comment: A supplied object handle was invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_INSTANCE_LOST
enum.comment: The slink:XrInstance was lost or could not be found. It will need to be destroyed and optionally recreated.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SESSION_RUNNING
enum.comment: The session <<session_running, is already running>>.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SESSION_NOT_RUNNING
enum.comment: The session <<session_not_running, is not yet running>>.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SESSION_LOST
enum.comment: The slink:XrSession was lost. It will need to be destroyed and optionally recreated.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SYSTEM_INVALID
enum.comment: The provided basetype:XrSystemId was invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_PATH_INVALID
enum.comment: The provided basetype:XrPath was not valid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_PATH_COUNT_EXCEEDED
enum.comment: The maximum number of supported semantic paths has been reached.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_PATH_FORMAT_INVALID
enum.comment: The semantic path character format is invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_PATH_UNSUPPORTED
enum.comment: The semantic path is unsupported.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_LAYER_INVALID
enum.comment: The layer was NULL or otherwise invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_LAYER_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
enum.comment: The number of specified layers is greater than the supported number.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SWAPCHAIN_RECT_INVALID
enum.comment: The image rect was negatively sized or otherwise invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SWAPCHAIN_FORMAT_UNSUPPORTED
enum.comment: The image format is not supported by the runtime or platform.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_ACTION_TYPE_MISMATCH
enum.comment: The API used to retrieve an action's state does not match the action's type.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SESSION_NOT_READY
enum.comment: The session is not in the ready state.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SESSION_NOT_STOPPING
enum.comment: The session is not in the stopping state.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_TIME_INVALID
enum.comment: The provided basetype:XrTime was zero, negative, or out of range.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_REFERENCE_SPACE_UNSUPPORTED
enum.comment: The specified reference space is not supported by the runtime or system.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_FILE_ACCESS_ERROR
enum.comment: The file could not be accessed.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_FILE_CONTENTS_INVALID
enum.comment: The file's contents were invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_FORM_FACTOR_UNSUPPORTED
enum.comment: The specified form factor is not supported by the current runtime or platform.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_FORM_FACTOR_UNAVAILABLE
enum.comment: The specified form factor is supported, but the device is currently not available, e.g. not plugged in or powered off.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_API_LAYER_NOT_PRESENT
enum.comment: A requested API layer is not present or could not be loaded.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_CALL_ORDER_INVALID
enum.comment: The call was made without having made a previously required call.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_GRAPHICS_DEVICE_INVALID
enum.comment: The given graphics device is not in a valid state. The graphics device could be lost or initialized without meeting graphics requirements.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_POSE_INVALID
enum.comment: The supplied pose was invalid with respect to the requirements.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_INDEX_OUT_OF_RANGE
enum.comment: The supplied index was outside the range of valid indices.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_VIEW_CONFIGURATION_TYPE_UNSUPPORTED
enum.comment: The specified view configuration type is not supported by the runtime or platform.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_ENVIRONMENT_BLEND_MODE_UNSUPPORTED
enum.comment: The specified environment blend mode is not supported by the runtime or platform.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_NAME_DUPLICATED
enum.comment: The name provided was a duplicate of an already-existing resource.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_NAME_INVALID
enum.comment: The name provided was invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_ACTIONSET_NOT_ATTACHED
enum.comment: A referenced action set is not attached to the session.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_ACTIONSETS_ALREADY_ATTACHED
enum.comment: The session already has attached action sets.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_LOCALIZED_NAME_DUPLICATED
enum.comment: The localized name provided was a duplicate of an already-existing resource.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_LOCALIZED_NAME_INVALID
enum.comment: The localized name provided was invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_GRAPHICS_REQUIREMENTS_CALL_MISSING
enum.comment: The fname:xrGetGraphicsRequirements* call was not made before calling fname:xrCreateSession.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_RUNTIME_UNAVAILABLE
enum.comment: The loader was unable to find or load a runtime.

enums.name: XrObjectType
enums.comment: Enums to track objects of various types

enum.name: XR_EYE_VISIBILITY_BOTH
enum.comment: Display in both eyes.

enum.name: XR_EYE_VISIBILITY_LEFT
enum.comment: Display in the left eye only.

enum.name: XR_EYE_VISIBILITY_RIGHT
enum.comment: Display in the right eye only.

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_LEVEL_POWER_SAVINGS_EXT
enum.comment: Performance settings hint used by the application to indicate that it enters a non-XR section (head-locked / static screen), during which power savings are to be prioritized

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_LEVEL_SUSTAINED_LOW_EXT
enum.comment: Performance settings hint used by the application to indicate that it enters a low and stable complexity section, during which reducing power is more important than occasional late rendering frames

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_LEVEL_SUSTAINED_HIGH_EXT
enum.comment: Performance settings hint used by the application to indicate that it enters a high or dynamic complexity section, during which the XR Runtime strives for consistent XR compositing and frame rendering within a thermally sustainable range

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_LEVEL_BOOST_EXT
enum.comment: Performance settings hint used by the application to indicate that the application enters a section with very high complexity, during which the XR Runtime is allowed to step up beyond the thermally sustainable range

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_DOMAIN_CPU_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates that the performance settings or notification applies to CPU domain

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_DOMAIN_GPU_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates that the performance settings or notification applies to GPU domain

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_SUB_DOMAIN_COMPOSITING_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates that the performance notification originates from the COMPOSITING sub-domain

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_SUB_DOMAIN_RENDERING_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates that the performance notification originates from the RENDERING sub-domain

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_SUB_DOMAIN_THERMAL_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates that the performance notification originates from the THERMAL sub-domain

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_NOTIF_LEVEL_NORMAL_EXT
enum.comment: Notifies that the sub-domain has reached a level where no further actions other than currently applied are necessary

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_NOTIF_LEVEL_WARNING_EXT
enum.comment: Notifies that the sub-domain has reached an early warning level where the application should start proactive mitigation actions with the goal to return to the ename:XR_PERF_NOTIF_LEVEL_NORMAL level

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_NOTIF_LEVEL_IMPAIRED_EXT
enum.comment: Notifies that the sub-domain has reached a critical level with significant performance degradation. The application should take drastic mitigation action

enum.name: XR_VISIBILITY_MASK_TYPE_HIDDEN_TRIANGLE_MESH_KHR
enum.comment: exclusive mesh; indicates that which the viewer cannot see.

enum.name: XR_VISIBILITY_MASK_TYPE_VISIBLE_TRIANGLE_MESH_KHR
enum.comment: inclusive mesh; indicates strictly that which the viewer can see.

enum.name: XR_VISIBILITY_MASK_TYPE_LINE_LOOP_KHR
enum.comment: line loop; traces the outline of the area the viewer can see.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_CREATE_PROTECTED_CONTENT_BIT
enum.comment: Content will be protected from CPU access

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_CREATE_STATIC_IMAGE_BIT
enum.comment: Only one image will be acquired from this swapchain over its lifetime

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_USAGE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT
enum.comment: Specifies that the image may: be a color rendering target.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_USAGE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT
enum.comment: Specifies that the image may: be a depth/stencil rendering target.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_USAGE_UNORDERED_ACCESS_BIT
enum.comment: Specifies that the image may: be accessed out of order and that access may: be via atomic operations.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_USAGE_TRANSFER_SRC_BIT
enum.comment: Specifies that the image may: be used as the source of a transfer operation.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_USAGE_TRANSFER_DST_BIT
enum.comment: Specifies that the image may: be used as the destination of a transfer operation.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT
enum.comment: Specifies that the image may: be sampled by a shader.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_USAGE_MUTABLE_FORMAT_BIT
enum.comment: Specifies that the image may: be reinterpreted as another image format.

enum.name: XR_VIEW_STATE_ORIENTATION_VALID_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates validity of all slink:XrView orientations

enum.name: XR_VIEW_STATE_POSITION_VALID_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates validity of all slink:XrView positions

enum.name: XR_VIEW_STATE_ORIENTATION_TRACKED_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates whether all slink:XrView orientations are actively tracked

enum.name: XR_VIEW_STATE_POSITION_TRACKED_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates whether all slink:XrView positions are actively tracked

enum.name: XR_COMPOSITION_LAYER_CORRECT_CHROMATIC_ABERRATION_BIT
enum.comment: Enables chromatic aberration correction when not done by default.

enum.name: XR_COMPOSITION_LAYER_BLEND_TEXTURE_SOURCE_ALPHA_BIT
enum.comment: Enables the layer texture alpha channel.

enum.name: XR_COMPOSITION_LAYER_UNPREMULTIPLIED_ALPHA_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates the texture color channels have not been premultiplied by the texture alpha channel.

enum.name: XR_SPACE_LOCATION_ORIENTATION_VALID_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates that the pname:orientation member contains valid data

enum.name: XR_SPACE_LOCATION_POSITION_VALID_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates that the pname:position member contains valid data

enum.name: XR_SPACE_LOCATION_ORIENTATION_TRACKED_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates whether pname:pose member contains an actively tracked pname:orientation

enum.name: XR_SPACE_LOCATION_POSITION_TRACKED_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates whether pname:pose member contains an actively tracked pname:position

enum.name: XR_SPACE_VELOCITY_LINEAR_VALID_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates that the pname:linearVelocity member contains valid data

enum.name: XR_SPACE_VELOCITY_ANGULAR_VALID_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates that the pname:angularVelocity member contains valid data

enum.name: XR_INPUT_SOURCE_LOCALIZED_NAME_USER_PATH_BIT
enum.comment: Asks for the part of the string which indicates the top level user path the source represents

enum.name: XR_INPUT_SOURCE_LOCALIZED_NAME_INTERACTION_PROFILE_BIT
enum.comment: Asks for the part of the string which represents the interaction profile of the source

enum.name: XR_INPUT_SOURCE_LOCALIZED_NAME_COMPONENT_BIT
enum.comment: Asks for the part of the string which represents the component on the device which needs to be interacted with

enum.name: XR_DEBUG_UTILS_MESSAGE_SEVERITY_VERBOSE_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: Most verbose output severity, typically used for debugging.

enum.name: XR_DEBUG_UTILS_MESSAGE_SEVERITY_INFO_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: General info message

enum.name: XR_DEBUG_UTILS_MESSAGE_SEVERITY_WARNING_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates the item may be the cause of issues.

enum.name: XR_DEBUG_UTILS_MESSAGE_SEVERITY_ERROR_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates that the item is definitely related to erroneous behavior.

enum.name: XR_DEBUG_UTILS_MESSAGE_TYPE_GENERAL_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates this is a general message

enum.name: XR_DEBUG_UTILS_MESSAGE_TYPE_VALIDATION_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates the message is related to a validation message

enum.name: XR_DEBUG_UTILS_MESSAGE_TYPE_PERFORMANCE_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates the message is related to a potential performance situation

enum.name: XR_DEBUG_UTILS_MESSAGE_TYPE_CONFORMANCE_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates the message is related to a non-conformant runtime result

enum.name: XR_OVERLAY_MAIN_SESSION_ENABLED_COMPOSITION_LAYER_INFO_DEPTH_BIT_EXTX
enum.comment: Indicates the main session enabled `XR_KHR_composition_layer_depth`

enum.name: XR_ANDROID_SURFACE_SWAPCHAIN_SYNCHRONOUS_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Create the underlying BufferQueue in synchronous mode

enum.name: XR_ANDROID_SURFACE_SWAPCHAIN_USE_TIMESTAMPS_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Acquire most recent buffer whose presentation timestamp is not greater than display time of final composited frame

enum.name: XR_COMPOSITION_LAYER_IMAGE_LAYOUT_VERTICAL_FLIP_BIT_FB
enum.comment: The coordinate origin of the swapchain image must be considered to be flipped vertically.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_CREATE_FOVEATION_SCALED_BIN_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Explicitly create the swapchain with scaled bin foveation support. The application must ensure that the swapchain is using the OpenGL graphics API and that the QCOM_texture_foveated extension is supported and enabled.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_CREATE_FOVEATION_FRAGMENT_DENSITY_MAP_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Explicitly create the swapchain with fragment density map foveation support. The application must ensure that the swapchain is using the Vulkan graphics API and that the VK_EXT_fragment_density_map extension is supported and enabled.

enum.name: XR_COMPOSITION_LAYER_SECURE_CONTENT_EXCLUDE_LAYER_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Indicates the layer will only be visible inside the HMD, and not visible to external sources

enum.name: XR_COMPOSITION_LAYER_SECURE_CONTENT_REPLACE_LAYER_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Indicates the layer will be displayed inside the HMD, but replaced by proxy content when written to external sources

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_LEVEL_NONE_FB
enum.comment: No foveation

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_LEVEL_LOW_FB
enum.comment: Less foveation (higher periphery visual fidelity, lower performance)

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_LEVEL_MEDIUM_FB
enum.comment: Medium foveation (medium periphery visual fidelity, medium performance)

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_LEVEL_HIGH_FB
enum.comment: High foveation (lower periphery visual fidelity, higher performance)

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_DYNAMIC_DISABLED_FB
enum.comment: Static foveation at the maximum desired level

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_DYNAMIC_LEVEL_ENABLED_FB
enum.comment: Dynamic changing foveation based on performance headroom available up to the maximum desired level

enum.name: XR_WINDING_ORDER_UNKNOWN_FB
enum.comment: Winding order is unknown and the runtime cannot make any assumptions on the triangle orientation

enum.name: XR_WINDING_ORDER_CW_FB
enum.comment: Clockwise winding order

enum.name: XR_WINDING_ORDER_CCW_FB
enum.comment: Counter-clockwise winding order

enum.name: XR_TRIANGLE_MESH_MUTABLE_BIT_FB
enum.comment: The triangle mesh is mutable (can be modified after it is created).

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_LAYER_PURPOSE_RECONSTRUCTION_FB
enum.comment: Reconstruction passthrough (full screen environment)

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_LAYER_PURPOSE_PROJECTED_FB
enum.comment: Projected passthrough (using a custom surface)

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_IS_RUNNING_AT_CREATION_BIT_FB
enum.comment: The object (passthrough, layer) is running at creation.

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_STATE_CHANGED_REINIT_REQUIRED_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Passthrough system requires reinitialization.

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_STATE_CHANGED_NON_RECOVERABLE_ERROR_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Non-recoverable error has occurred. A device reboot or a firmware update may be required.

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_STATE_CHANGED_RECOVERABLE_ERROR_BIT_FB
enum.comment: A recoverable error has occurred. The runtime will attempt to recover, but some functionality may be temporarily unavailable.

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_STATE_CHANGED_RESTORED_ERROR_BIT_FB
enum.comment: The runtime has recovered from a previous error and is functioning normally.

enum.name: XR_HAND_TRACKING_AIM_COMPUTED_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Aiming data is computed from additional sources beyond the hand data in the base structure

enum.name: XR_HAND_TRACKING_AIM_VALID_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Aiming data is valid

enum.name: XR_HAND_TRACKING_AIM_INDEX_PINCHING_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Index finger pinch discrete signal

enum.name: XR_HAND_TRACKING_AIM_MIDDLE_PINCHING_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Middle finger pinch discrete signal

enum.name: XR_HAND_TRACKING_AIM_RING_PINCHING_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Ring finger pinch discrete signal

enum.name: XR_HAND_TRACKING_AIM_LITTLE_PINCHING_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Little finger pinch discrete signal

enum.name: XR_HAND_TRACKING_AIM_SYSTEM_GESTURE_BIT_FB
enum.comment: System gesture is active

enum.name: XR_HAND_TRACKING_AIM_DOMINANT_HAND_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Hand is currently marked as dominant for the system

enum.name: XR_HAND_TRACKING_AIM_MENU_PRESSED_BIT_FB
enum.comment: System menu gesture is active

implicitexternsyncparams.param: the pname:session parameter by any other flink:xrWaitFrame call
the slink:XrInstance used to create pname:messenger, and all of its child handles
the buffers returned from calls to flink:xrTriangleMeshGetVertexBufferFB and flink:xrTriangleMeshGetIndexBufferFB on pname:mesh

require.comment: Types not directly used by the API

enum.name: XR_ERROR_ANDROID_THREAD_SETTINGS_ID_INVALID_KHR
enum.comment: xrSetAndroidApplicationThreadKHR failed as thread id is invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_ANDROID_THREAD_SETTINGS_FAILURE_KHR
enum.comment: xrSetAndroidApplicationThreadKHR failed setting the thread attributes/priority.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_CREATE_SPATIAL_ANCHOR_FAILED_MSFT
enum.comment: Spatial anchor could not be created at that location.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SECONDARY_VIEW_CONFIGURATION_TYPE_NOT_ENABLED_MSFT
enum.comment: The secondary view configuration was not enabled when creating the session.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_CONTROLLER_MODEL_KEY_INVALID_MSFT
enum.comment: The controller model key is invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_REPROJECTION_MODE_UNSUPPORTED_MSFT
enum.comment: The reprojection mode is not supported.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_USAGE_INPUT_ATTACHMENT_BIT_MND
enum.comment: Specifies that the image may: be used as a input attachment.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_COMPUTE_NEW_SCENE_NOT_COMPLETED_MSFT
enum.comment: Compute new scene not completed.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SCENE_COMPONENT_ID_INVALID_MSFT
enum.comment: Scene component id invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SCENE_COMPONENT_TYPE_MISMATCH_MSFT
enum.comment: Scene component type mismatch.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SCENE_MESH_BUFFER_ID_INVALID_MSFT
enum.comment: Scene mesh buffer id invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SCENE_COMPUTE_FEATURE_INCOMPATIBLE_MSFT
enum.comment: Scene compute feature incompatible.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SCENE_COMPUTE_CONSISTENCY_MISMATCH_MSFT
enum.comment: Scene compute consistency mismatch.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_DISPLAY_REFRESH_RATE_UNSUPPORTED_FB
enum.comment: The display refresh rate is not supported by the platform.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_COLOR_SPACE_UNSUPPORTED_FB
enum.comment: The color space is not supported by the runtime.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_UNEXPECTED_STATE_PASSTHROUGH_FB
enum.comment: The object state is unexpected for the issued command.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_FEATURE_ALREADY_CREATED_PASSTHROUGH_FB
enum.comment: Trying to create an MR feature when one was already created and only one instance is allowed.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_FEATURE_REQUIRED_PASSTHROUGH_FB
enum.comment: Requested functionality requires a feature to be created first.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_NOT_PERMITTED_PASSTHROUGH_FB
enum.comment: Requested functionality is not permitted - application is not allowed to perform the requested operation.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_RESOURCES_PASSTHROUGH_FB
enum.comment: There weren't sufficient resources available to perform an operation.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_UNKNOWN_PASSTHROUGH_FB
enum.comment: Unknown Passthrough error (no further details provided).

enum.name: XR_ERROR_MARKER_NOT_TRACKED_VARJO
enum.comment: Marker tracking is disabled or the specified marker is not currently tracked.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_MARKER_ID_INVALID_VARJO
enum.comment: The specified marker ID is not valid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SPATIAL_ANCHOR_NAME_NOT_FOUND_MSFT
enum.comment: A spatial anchor was not found associated with the spatial anchor name provided

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SPATIAL_ANCHOR_NAME_INVALID_MSFT
enum.comment: The spatial anchor name provided was not valid

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_USAGE_INPUT_ATTACHMENT_BIT_KHR
enum.comment: Specifies that the image may: be used as a input attachment.
